One correction about how things works at the moment.

On Tue, 2003-11-11 at 11:51, Kristinn Sigur√∞sson wrote:
>  
> * doc/sec 
>  
> This is the number of documents that are being collected per second. 
> It comes in two flavors.
>  
> 1. Current
> A snapshot of (roughly) the last second.
Actually it is the doc/sec since the last snapshot (the statistics
interval in the order.xml file).

>  
> 2. Overall
> Total number of downloaded URIs divided by the number of seconds that
> the crawl has been running.
>  
> * KB/sec
>  
> The number of KB downloaded.  It comes in the same two flavors as the
> doc/sec.
>
